sentences.sContent: Monokaryons of this fungus will grow readily as saprophytes in plate or liquid culture .
sentences.sContent_eng: Monokaryons of this fungus will grow readily as saprophytes in plate or liquid culture .
sentences.sCn: 这种真菌的单核体在平板或液体培养时能像腐生菌那样容易生长。

remMethod.val: fun(有趣) + g + us(我们) → 我们第一次看到有趣的真菌 → 真菌

trans.tranCn: 真菌， 霉菌； 菌类
trans.tranOther: a simple type of plant that has no leaves or flowers and that grows on plants or other surfaces.  mushrooms  and  mould  are both fungi.
